description: Bhim Acharya (born 27 April 1959) is a secretary of the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist-Leninist) and a Nepali politician. He served as the Chief Minister of Province No. 1 from 26 August 2021 to 1 November 2021. He was also the Minister for Culture, Tourism and Civil Aviation of Nepal in 2014 under the Sushil Koirala-led government. Acharya has held several parliamentary positions, including being a member of the 2nd Nepalese Constituent Assembly and an incumbent member of the House of Representatives of Nepal for the Sunsari 2 constituency since December 2022.
short_description: Bhim Acharya is a Nepali politician, secretary of the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist-Leninist), and former Chief Minister of Province No. 1.
